hh3cDot11CFGEXT.name: hh3cDot11CFGEXT

revisions.description: The initial revision of this MIB module.

hh3cDot11CFGEXT.contactinfo: Platform Team H3C Technologies Co., Ltd. Hai-Dian District Beijing P.R. China Http://www.h3c.com Zip:100085
hh3cDot11CFGEXT.description: This MIB provides information for WLAN configuration extended. The hh3c-dot11-cfg.mib define MIB objects for WLAN basic configuration, while this MIB will define MIB objects for load balance these kinds feature. GLOSSARY IEEE 802.11 Standard to encourage interoperability among wireless networking equipment. Access point (AP) Transmitter/receiver (transceiver) device that commonly connects and transports data between a wireless network and a wired network. Access control (AC) To control and manage multi-APs, it will bridge wireless and wired network. Fat AP Applied in the home, SOHO and so on, and it could work independently without help from AC. Fit AP Applied in the enterprise environment, it will work under the control and management from AC. Control And Provisioning of Wireless Access Points Protocol The short name of protocol is CAPWAP. AC will control and manage AP by CAPWAP tunnel protocol defined by IETF. Also, a data tunnel will be set up between AC and AP. BSS IEEE 802.11 Basic Service Set (Radio Cell). The BSS of an AP comprises of the stations directly associating with the AP. Radio The chip set to receive and send wireless signal. Association The service used to establish access point or station mapping and enable station invocation of the distribution system services. (Wireless clients attempt to connect to access points.) Basic Rate A data rate that is mandatory for client devices to support in order for them to achieve successful association. MSDU MAC Service Data Unit, it is frame format defined by 802.11. TU It is 1,024 microseconds (ms), which is about 1 millisecond. AKM The authentication and key management method defined by 802.11i, and which includes 802.1x and pre-shared key.

hh3cDot11LoadBalanceTrafficEnable.name: hh3cDot11LoadBalanceTrafficEnable
hh3cDot11LoadBalanceTrafficEnable.description: Represents whether enable load balancing according to station traffic.

hh3cDot11LoadBalanceTrafficThres.name: hh3cDot11LoadBalanceTrafficThres
hh3cDot11LoadBalanceTrafficThres.description: Represents the threshold value for Traffic based load balancing.

hh3cDot11LoadBalanceSessionEnable.name: hh3cDot11LoadBalanceSessionEnable
hh3cDot11LoadBalanceSessionEnable.description: Represents whether enable load balancing according to station session number.

hh3cDot11LoadBalanceSessionThres.name: hh3cDot11LoadBalanceSessionThres
hh3cDot11LoadBalanceSessionThres.description: Represents the threshold value for session number based load balancing.

hh3cDot11LoadBalanceTrafficGap.name: hh3cDot11LoadBalanceTrafficGap
hh3cDot11LoadBalanceTrafficGap.description: Traffic gap threshold. Load balancing is carried out for a radio when the traffic threshold and session gap are exceeded.

hh3cDot11LoadBalanceSessionGap.name: hh3cDot11LoadBalanceSessionGap
hh3cDot11LoadBalanceSessionGap.description: Session gap threshold. Load balancing is carried out for a radio when the session threshold and session gap are exceeded.

hh3cDot11LBTrafficThresKbps.name: hh3cDot11LBTrafficThresKbps
hh3cDot11LBTrafficThresKbps.description: Represents the threshold value for Traffic based load balancing.

hh3cDot11LBTrafficGapKbps.name: hh3cDot11LBTrafficGapKbps
hh3cDot11LBTrafficGapKbps.description: Traffic gap threshold. Load balancing is carried out for a radio when the traffic threshold gap are exceeded.

hh3cDot11LBRadioGroupTable.name: hh3cDot11LBRadioGroupTable
hh3cDot11LBRadioGroupTable.description: This table defines load balance radio group.

hh3cDot11LBRadioGroupEntry.name: hh3cDot11LBRadioGroupEntry
hh3cDot11LBRadioGroupEntry.description: Each entry contains information of one load balance radio group.

hh3cDot11LBRadioGroupId.name: hh3cDot11LBRadioGroupId
hh3cDot11LBRadioGroupId.description: Represents load balance radio group ID.

hh3cDot11LBRadioGroupDesc.name: hh3cDot11LBRadioGroupDesc
hh3cDot11LBRadioGroupDesc.description: Represents the description of load balance radio group.

hh3cDot11LBRadioGroupRowStatus.name: hh3cDot11LBRadioGroupRowStatus
hh3cDot11LBRadioGroupRowStatus.description: The row status of this table entry.
